hero_tagline: I help organizations design data-driven foundations—architecture, governance, and analytics—that scale.
welcome_copy: Use the top navigation to access full pages.
overview_body: Senior Information & Data Architect with 30+ years across financial services, public sector, telecom, retail/CPG, automotive, pharma and manufacturing. I specialize in enterprise information architecture, data platforms, analytics modernization, AI readiness and governance (GLC/AODA). I combine strategy/standards with hands-on delivery: C/L/P data models, reference mappings, curated & semantic layers, lineage, and BI/semantic modeling on Azure, AWS, Snowflake, Databricks, and SAP/legacy.
gl_mccss: MCCSS — Ministry of Children, Community and Social Services
ai_item1: Manulife — AI readiness; curated/semantic layers in Databricks; AWS/Salesforce integration. Impact: prompt-ready Q&A; 25–35% less manual analysis.
ai_item2: Canada Post — elasticity & pricing; governed data to exec dashboards. Impact: multi-day → same-day refresh.
ai_item3: BRP — domain models & data products in Snowflake. Impact: 20–30% reconciliation reduction.
gov_item1: MCCSS — CPIN DW aligned to AODA; governance templates. Impact: better compliance; fewer rework cycles.
gov_item2: OLG — GLC processes; enterprise logical model; Customer Hub. Impact: unified KPIs; consistent BI.
gov_item3: Canada Post — PIA/TRA alignment; standards for data products.
edw_item1: Canadian Tire — EDW→Lakehouse; Data Vault & MDM; best practices. Impact: faster delivery via reusable patterns.
edw_item2: BRP — SAP→Snowflake; GDPR/SOX; Power BI. Impact: higher trust and shorter cycles.
edw_item3: TTC — ODS & ridership mart; planning analytics. Impact: more timely, consistent metrics.
edw_item4: RBC — portfolio accounting mart; standards/mappings. Impact: less manual reconciliation; clearer access.
edw_item5: Shoppers Drug Mart — EDW bus; conformed dimensions; UAT. Impact: predictable releases.
edw_item6: GSK — clinical reporting; BO universes; materialized views. Impact: faster queries.
timeline_1: 2024–Present — Manulife — AI readiness; curation & semantic; AWS/Salesforce.
timeline_3: 2022–2023 — Canada Post — pricing; governed EDW outputs; dashboards.
timeline_4: 2015–2020 — Canadian Tire — EDW→Lakehouse; Data Vault/MDM; standards.
timeline_5: Earlier — MCCSS, OLG, TTC, WSIB, RBC, SDM, GSK, Rogers — EDW/BI, governance, accessibility.

resume_summary_body: Senior Information & Data Architect (30+ years) focused on AI/ML readiness, GLC/AODA-aligned governance, modeling (conceptual/logical/physical/dimensional/Vault/MDM), curated & semantic layers, ETL/ELT mappings, lineage and BI semantics across Azure, AWS, Snowflake, Databricks and SAP/legacy.
